title: Drawing, "Costume Design for Man with Green Tunic and Tan Tights, for Production of "Merry Wives of Windsor"", September 30, 1927
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor on illustration board
markings: Verso: stamped in blue ink, center: THIS DRAWING IS MY PERSONAL PROPERTY / AND MUST BE RETURNED TO ME / HENRY DREYFUSS / SEP 30 1927 / logo of Scenic Artists Union Local 829; printed in brown ink, upper left: Drawing Board / City / HP (hot pressed) for pen-and-ink, CP (cold pressed) / Special Surfaces Nos 1 & 2 for Wash Drawings
signed: Signed in black ink, upper left: Henry Dreyfuss
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Man wearing green tunic and tan tights.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design for Man with Green Tunic and Tan Tights, for Production of "Merry Wives of Windsor"", September 30, 1927.
September 30, 1927. Graphite, brush and watercolor on illustration board. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-128.
